name: insight
description: Web app for time series exploration

scripts.build: NODE_ENV=development browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ latest react ]  --plugins [ transform-object-rest-spread ] ] app/js/app.js -o server/static/js/bundle.js
scripts.watch: NODE_ENV=development watchify -t [ babelify --presets [ latest react ] --plugins [ transform-object-rest-spread ] ] app/js/app.js -o server/static/js/bundle.js
scripts.prodBuild: NODE_ENV=production browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ latest react ] --plugins [ transform-object-rest-spread ] ] -t envify -g uglifyify app/js/app.js -o server/static/js/bundle.js

author: Charles Lovering & Cuong Nguyen
